events.message: I received the order yesterday, but the product was not what I expected. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the item does not match the description.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to dissatisfaction with the product, so the issue is categorized under Refund.
The case has been assigned to Agent Sarah for handling the refund process and further communication with the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to assist you with your refund request and ensure we resolve this quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unopened or if you have already used it, to process the refund accordingly?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The product is unopened and still in its original packaging, so I hope this helps expedite the refund.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately and you should receive confirmation within 3 to 5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response! I appreciate your help in resolving this promptly.
We have processed your refund successfully. Please check your payment method for the return of funds within the next few days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us!
